review.author: DevOps (Codex)
findings: APPROVED — Evidence Ledger runtime fix: better-sqlite3 added, DB initializes at boot, CLI returns real data.
Boot sequence placement correct: after settings load, before WS/IPC traffic.
Seed from session-handoff.json is safe and idempotent (empty-table check + stable SHA1 IDs).
Unavailable-runtime recreation prevents stale degraded cache.
No crash paths — all failures return {ok:false} without throwing.
Cross-file contracts verified: hivemind-app.js → handlers → store/memory/investigator all match.
Cross-model (Gemini) verified: boot init reachable, seed path e2e confirmed, DB populated with decisions+sessions.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
